main_definition: A therapist is a trained professional who helps individuals or groups overcome mental, emotional, or behavioral challenges.

meanings_and_examples.example: As a clinical psychologist, John works with patients to diagnose and treat various forms of anxiety disorders.
Dr. Smith is a psychiatrist who specializes in treating severe mental illnesses such as schizophrenia with medication and therapy.
Sarah works as a counselor at a college, helping students deal with academic stress and personal issues.
As a marriage & family therapist, Lisa helps couples improve their relationship through communication skills training.
Paul is a life coach who works with clients to set and achieve personal goals such as career advancement or improving relationships.
